name: Dreevo
author: logixgrid

sections.description:
About Dreevo

Boost your deliveries results with dreevo

Enjoy working with a great logistics partner who is looking after your growth. dreevo aims to empower the e-commerce entrepreneurs to grow their businesses through providing reliable, affordable and technological logistics solutions that fit their different business models. Aiming to simplify the e-commerce business cycle for both merchants and customers, dreevo provides a wide range of last mile delivery solutions and services such as Door-to-Door Delivery, Warehousing and Fulfillment, Pick Up Stations, Pick, Choose and Return Services; can all be customized to cater to the merchant’s specific business model.

Digitalize your whole delivery experience

All of dreevo’s services are backed up by advanced analytics that allow customer experience optimization, as well as delivery monitoring and tracking, that streamline the delivery process. Integrating with dreevo’s technology enables you to take full control of your orders while reading all your business data on our intelligence dashboard.

Key features

1) One-click easy setup
2) Create all your cash collection orders
3) Empower your operations with advanced services like Pick, Choose and Return to
4) enable your customer choose from different types of one product
5) Seamless Customer Returns Management experience
6) Orders Tracking is available for you and your customers on our website
7) Amazing customer support options like phone, email or online chat

Enjoy your business operations with dreevo wordpress plugin!
